name: Utsuru - Inkfection
description:
Known Issue - Singleplayer  BGM may overlap on replay, refresh to reset.


Created for Touhou Station Jam 2

Explore the infected Scarlet Devil Mansion, sneaking up on Infected Yokai and sealing them before their infection spreads to you - But your attacks are only effective when you catch them unawares, so be sure to use your positioning and stealth to clear the mansion.

This game also features two to five player Multiplayer, where other players take control of the Mansion Yokai, aiming to deconstruct the Shrine Maiden's barrier before she can seal them all, with the help of traps and special paths, Multiplayer is a reverse of the singleplayer gameplay with an extended map.

Controls

Arrow Keys / WASD for movement. Space for most interactions (Vaulting, Climbing into things, helping allies)

Use the mouse to attack, click and hold for a lunging attack. Other commands vary by game mode, Multiplayer features many more interactable elements.

Credits

Touhou owned by Team Shanghai Alice (ZUN)

YeeHaw - PowerUp Icons

Font Yuzu-Pen M by Kagurazaka Yuzu
